articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Roseburg hit 65°F on February 22, making it the warmest day of 2025 so far. While warm, it didn’t break the 2002 record of 70°F. The record low for the date remains 28°F, set in 2019. Locals enjoyed the mild weather as spring approaches.
articles.title: Roseburg Enjoys Warmest Day of 2025 So Far
